member.name: T:r_zero1Native.class_z
member.summary:
The class_z class provides a CLS compliant, Object (native) interface to the MATLAB functions contained in the files:
C:\Users\xjs\Desktop\matlab_related\r_zero.m

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.#cctor
member.summary: The static constructor instantiates and initializes the MATLAB Runtime instance.

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs a new instance of the class_z class.

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.Finalize
member.summary: Class destructor called by the CLR garbage collector.

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.Dispose
member.summary: Frees the native resources associated with this object

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.r_zero
member.summary: Provides a single output, 0-input Objectinterface to the r_zero MATLAB function.
member.returns: An Object containing the first output argument.

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.r_zero(System.Object)
member.summary: Provides a single output, 1-input Objectinterface to the r_zero MATLAB function.
member.returns: An Object containing the first output argument.

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.r_zero(System.Int32)
member.summary: Provides the standard 0-input Object interface to the r_zero MATLAB function.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return.
member.returns: An Array of length "numArgsOut" containing the output arguments.

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.r_zero(System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Provides the standard 1-input Object interface to the r_zero MATLAB function.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return.
member.returns: An Array of length "numArgsOut" containing the output arguments.

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.r_zero(System.Int32,System.Object[]@,System.Object[],System.Object[])
member.summary: Provides an interface for the r_zero function in which the input and output arguments are specified as an array of Objects.
member.remarks: This method will allocate and return by reference the output argument array.
member.param: The number of output arguments to return
Array of Object representing variable input arguments

member.name: M:r_zero1Native.class_z.WaitForFiguresToDie
member.summary: This method will cause a MATLAB figure window to behave as a modal dialog box. The method will not return until all the figure windows associated with this component have been closed.
member.remarks: An application should only call this method when required to keep the MATLAB figure window from disappearing. Other techniques, such as calling Console.ReadLine() from the application should be considered where possible.
